and relaxation or caring for

The	number	of	different	
antenatal classes available 
varies from place to place.
If you have a multiple 
pregnancy, try to start your 
classes at around 24 weeks, 
because your babies are more 
likely to be born earlier. Some 
hospitals have special classes 
for parents who are expecting 
multiple babies. Parents 
expecting multiple babies may 
also be shown around the 
neonatal unit because twins 
and triplets are more likely to
